title: Import: trx import command for beads JSONL
description: trx import .beads/issues.jsonl [--prefix PREFIX]. Read beads JSONL, convert to trx format (mostly compatible), write to .trx/issues.jsonl. Handle ID prefix conversion (bd-xxx -> trx-xxx or keep original). Report stats: imported, skipped, errors.

title: CLI: update command - modify issues
description: trx update ID [--status STATUS] [--priority P] [--title TITLE] [--desc DESC]. Update issue fields. Support --json output.

title: CLI: list command - show issues
description: trx list [--status STATUS] [--type TYPE] [--all]. List issues in table format. Default shows open only. Support --json output.

title: CLI: close command - close issues
description: trx close ID [-r REASON]. Close issue with optional reason. Support --json output.

title: TUI: Issue list view with filtering and sorting
description: Main list view showing issues. Filter by status/type/priority. Sort by priority, date, PageRank score. Vim-style navigation (j/k/g/G).

title: TUI: Dependency graph visualization
description: ASCII/Unicode graph view showing dependency relationships. Highlight cycles, critical path, blocked chains.

title: TUI: Multi-repo workspace support
description: Load workspace.yaml with multiple repos. Aggregate view across repos. Support beads-viewer workspace format for compatibility.

title: CLI: create command - new issues
description: trx create TITLE [-t TYPE] [-p PRIORITY] [-d DESC] [--parent ID]. Create new issue, print ID. Support --json output.

title: CLI: sync command - git add/commit .trx
description: trx sync [-m MESSAGE]. Git add and commit .trx/ directory. Simple wrapper, no complex merge logic - let git handle it.

title: trx-core: Core library implementation
description: Implement the core trx library with minimal issue model, JSONL storage, and graph operations. Must be beads-viewer compatible for dependency visualization.

title: trx-cli: Command-line interface
description: Implement the trx CLI with essential commands. Minimal but complete. Must support --json output for scripting and agent integration.

title: trx-tui: Terminal UI viewer
description: Ratatui-based TUI that replaces beads-viewer. Interactive issue browser with graph visualization, PageRank scoring, and cross-repo workspace support.

title: Issue data model with beads-compatible JSONL format
description: Implement Issue struct with ~20 fields (vs beads' ~117). Must serialize to beads-compatible JSONL for beads-viewer compatibility. Include: id, title, description, status, priority, issue_type, labels, timestamps, dependencies array.

title: CLI: show command - issue details
description: trx show ID. Display full issue details including description, dependencies, timestamps. Support --json output.

title: Hash-based ID generation for conflict-free merges
description: Implement ID generation using UUID+timestamp hash. Format: trx-xxxx (4 alphanumeric). Support hierarchical IDs for children: trx-xxxx.1.2. Include parse/validate utilities.

title: TUI: Robot mode JSON output for automation
description: trx tui --robot-triage, --robot-next, --robot-insights. JSON output for CI/automation. Compatible with beads-viewer robot mode.

title: Dependency graph with cycle detection and ready-work analysis
description: Implement IssueGraph using petgraph for: cycle detection, topological sort, ready work (issues with no open blockers), critical path analysis. Should support beads-viewer's PageRank-style prioritization.

title: CLI: ready command - show unblocked work
description: trx ready. Show open issues with no open blocking dependencies. Sorted by priority. Support --json output.

title: JSONL store - read/write issues without SQLite
description: Implement Store struct that reads/writes .trx/issues.jsonl directly. No SQLite, no daemon. Operations: load_all, save_all, get, create, update, delete (tombstone). Must handle concurrent access gracefully.

title: Beads migration: Import and purge
description: Commands to import existing beads issues and purge beads from repos. Critical for adoption - must be seamless migration path.

title: Migration docs and byt integration
description: Document migration path in README. Update byt to support trx alongside beads. Add byt tools install trx.

title: CLI: dep command - manage dependencies
description: trx dep add ID --blocks OTHER. trx dep rm ID --blocks OTHER. trx dep tree ID. Manage issue dependencies.

title: TUI: Issue detail panel
description: Side panel or modal showing full issue details. Title, description, dependencies, timestamps. Scrollable content.

title: CLI: init command - create .trx directory
description: trx init [--prefix PREFIX]. Creates .trx/ directory with config.toml and empty issues.jsonl. Detect if already initialized.

title: Purge: trx purge-beads command
description: trx purge-beads [--force]. Remove .beads/ directory, daemon socket, registry entries. Warn if not imported first. --force skips confirmation.
